page.title: 20Village Policeman
page.content:
Village life does not usually lend itself to crime and our villages are no exception.We have a local{policeman in{Cropthorne}and we often see him around.He is known to us as "Bob"and he is here to help the community when needed.He is attached to{Evesham {Police Station}where the{Magistrates {Court}sits. ________________________
This Domesday Project has been prepared and produced by the {Children and Teacher of Class 1 {Cropthorne with Charlton C.E.First {School. Assisted by{School Staff, Parents,}the {Vicar}and{Residents}of the village of {Cropthorne.
